title: Toxic Sludge Is Good for You: Lies, Damn Lies and the Public Relations Industry
description: Common Courageâ€™s number one seller blows the lid off of today's multi-billion-dollar propaganda-for-hire PR industry, revealing how public relations wizards concoct and spin the news, organize phony "grassroots" front groups, spy on citizens and conspire with lobbyists and politicians.
author: John Stauber
